sentences.orig: ရပ်ပြစ်ရှစ်ပါး

terms: eight statesinfavourable for the relazation of the dharma leading to nirvana. vizthe abode of suffering,the abode of animals,the realm of the departed beings,the realm of the unconscious and of the fornless,the outlying regions of the world to which no Buddhas nor their disciples can gain access,a place where people hold wrong views,a place where people holding right views are incapable of understanding the Four Noble Truths, although they are born during the period when Buddha's teachings flourihed,a place where people are capable of understanding the Four Noble Truths but born during the world-cycle when Buddha do not appear

entry.word: eight statesinfavourable for the relazation of the dharma leading to nirvana. vizthe abode of suffering,the abode of animals,the realm of the departed beings,the realm of the unconscious and of the fornless,the outlying regions of the world to which no Buddhas nor their disciples can gain access,a place where people hold wrong views,a place where people holding right views are incapable of understanding the Four Noble Truths, although they are born during the period when Buddha's teachings flourihed,a place where people are capable of understanding the Four Noble Truths but born during the world-cycle when Buddha do not appear
